title: FARM SECURITY LIGHTS TO DETER PREDATORS AND PEOPLE!!

tasks.task: Install solar lights around the chicken coop to deter predators.
subtasks: Remove protective layer from solar panel.
Insert key into power switch to turn on lights.
Position lights in direct sunlight to charge.
Mount lights using screws and level for stability.
Position lights on eaves to avoid water damage.
Secure lights with two self-tapping screws.
Conduct inspection and adjustment for proper alignment.
Test lights at night to verify sufficient brightness.
Apply discount code to purchase additional lights.
